评论详情: Runs small

评论概述: Cheap fabric, colors not as appeared in marketing photos
评论详情: I purchased this for my daughter for Christmas. I ordered it on 12/12 and it arrived today, 12/29. The product page did not mention that this was an international shipment.  The color (J08 -pink) is not as appeared in the advertisement. The color I expected was pale pink/purple ombré. What I got was more of a baby pink at the top.  The fabric was not described on Amazon, but the appearance seemed to be cotton or cotton blend. What I got is a very cheap feeling polyester, with a synthetic fleece inside. The only label on this is for size. There is no fabric or care label.  I feel duped. I trust Amazon to have vendors who sell quality merchandise and are honest about the product. Of all the issues here, the cheap fabric is what angers me the most. Don’t buy this product.

评论概述: I bought 4 of these and I love them so much
评论详情: I ordered several sizes up (3x) - I usually wear an xl for it to fit me big. These fit me well, I love the gradient colors, the material and the thickness works for me, they aren't overly thick which I like. I am tall and the length and width both fit me nicely. These hoodies are so unique and not plain with just 1 color. I will order more colors for sure!
I really like the Ombre color of this but I'm not loving the material. The outside is shiny and slick. The inside is cozy and comfy. If it wasn't, I would return it but I'll keep it.

I ordered an XL because I wanted a big oversized comfy fit and it was more fitted. I can wear a medium but I usually order larges because I like my clothes looser and I even went another size up with this one. The fabric was disappointing as well, instead of the typical sweatshirt material it was a satiny polyester type fabric. Not the comfy cozy vibe I was after!
This sweatshirt is very thin and see through. Also - runs very small, specifically in the arm length .

评论概述: Not what it looks in the picture
评论详情: I bought 4 of these all different colors and sizes as gift's, I can definitely say the colors DO NOT look like the color in the pictures on all 4, not sure if the size will fit the people I got them for and I did get a size bigger on each just to be safe due to the material which is 100% polyester so there’s no stretching at all. So these are Christmas gifts and of course I have to wait for them to get them before I know if they will fit them? So as of now I’m only giving these sweatshirts a 3 and that’s being generous. The colors are black, Wine, Purple, and Navy and none of them look like the selling picture. Please see attached photos of the colors.
I bought on for my daughter and grand daughter, they both love the colors and the quality of the sweatshirts. Have to wait to receive but the product is so special they are worth it
Sleeves are so sorry and right! The rest of the sweatshirt fits perfectly but they might as well advertise that the sleeves are 3/4 sleeves! What a bummer!
